trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class for an expression, which evaluates to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una classe astratta per un'espressione che restituisce un <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A condition is an expression, which evaluates to a `Boolean` value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Una condizione è un'espressione che restituisce un `Boolean` valore.

trans-unit.source: Windows Workflow Foundation offers two condition types: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference>.
trans-unit.target: Windows Workflow Foundation sono disponibili due tipi di condizione: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition>e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition>

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom condition type by deriving from this class and implementing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition.Evaluate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare un tipo di condizione personalizzato mediante derivazione da questa classe e l'implementazione di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition.Evaluate%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> resulting from evaluating the underlying expression.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> risultante dalla valutazione dell'espressione sottostante.
